Message:
The flower festival continues
on into the night.

The bonfire lit in a prayer
for happiness crackles
into countless flowers of fire,
each lighting up the night sky
before rising to the heavens...

At the dreamlike sight,
I recalled the events
of the previous day.

Contracting with the angel
was surprisingly simple.

The angels must be desperate
now that the demons
have begun to move.

Flowers may wither,
but in the coming year,
they will bloom anew.

Even if this festival
comes to an end,
it shall be held again
next spring.

That is why we pass things
on to the next generation,
so they can repeat the cycle.

That is the circle of life...
A fate I, too, shall
one day have to meet.

A loud cheer suddenly
breaks out amongst the crowd.
It seems the festival
has come to a close.

...I won’t wish for
my miracle just yet.
There is still something
I must do.

But, once everything is over...
After that, I can finally...

Even if I do forget
everything between us,

if I can hear how
the gentle dream of
that person continues,
then...
